Posts.Content: pblarson wrote: I am three weeks post surgery (mastectomy & reconstruction expander) and still have the drain in.  I am wondering about other people's experience with their drains.  I am told that the drainage needs to be 30 cc or less in 24 hours to remove it and mine is still around 90 cc.  My plastic surgeon says that it's a little unusual, but doesn't say much else and I am left wondering.... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How long have you had the drain in? pblarson AnneW
